results.title: Effect of simvastatin (80 mg) on coronary and abdominal aortic arterial calcium (from the coronary artery calcification treatment with zocor [CATZ] study).
results.text_hl: We tested the hypothesis that, compared with placebo, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ would reduce the progression of @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery calcium@@@ (@DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAC@@@) and abdominal @<m>DISEASE_Calcium_Metabolism_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002128 @@@aortic calcium@@@ (@DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@AAC@@@) levels in participants asymptomatic for @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@vascular disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Terry JG, Carr JJ, Kouba EO, Davis DH, Menon L, Bender K, Chandler ET, Morgan T, Crouse JR 3rd. Effect of simvastatin (80 mg) on coronary and abdominal aortic arterial calcium (from the coronary artery calcification treatment with zocor [CATZ] study). Am J Cardiol. 2007 Jun 15;99(12):1714-7. PMID: 17560880

results.title: Muscle mitochondrial metabolism and calcium signaling impairment in patients treated with statins.
results.text_hl: In previous studies, we showed that acute application in vitro of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ caused @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@impairment of mitochondrial function@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Calcium_Metabolism_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002128 @@@dysfunction of calcium homeostasis@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ and @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ healthy muscle samples.

citations.NLM: Sirvent P, Fabre O, Bordenave S, Hillaire-Buys D, Raynaud De Mauverger E, Lacampagne A, Mercier J. Muscle mitochondrial metabolism and calcium signaling impairment in patients treated with statins. Toxicol Appl Pharmacol. 2012 Mar 1;259(2):263-8. PMID: 22269104
